properties.description: A rustic and cosy cabin on the verge of the glaciers in the eastern Bernese Oberland. 150 years ago, it was here in the Susten region that the second SAC cabin was built. Today, the access trail is well-known for its spectacular suspension bridge and the ladders. The cabin offers manifold possibilities for high alpine, ski mountaineering tours and popular climbing routes as well as an educational trail about geology.
